Proximity_Encryption_Suite

Class Login_Account_Create

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • Proximity_Encryption_Suite.Login_Account_Create
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Login_Account_Create
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    The Login_Account_Create.Java Class implements an application that allows a users to create an account so why can be given access to the Proximity Encryption Suite.
    Since:
    18-01-2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Harry Clewlow (C012952A)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
